title: Moral High Ground vs. Moral Pit
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are in chambers this week! They talk about diet sodas, fruity teas, shower maintenance while staying with in-laws, and bedsheet changing. Plus a listener letter about ATMs!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
